page.title: 20SCHOOL LIFE POEM (continued)
page.content: Just after May, The Rounders Tournament we did play. We were good with our shots And scored lots and lots. All these things happened this year. Along with the academic work Which some get to fear! It's all part of junior life in the Eighties. I hope all you readers get as much fun In the centuries to come. {By Paul Coppard and the rest of Class1 ************************************** {CREDITS:}S.BROADWAY;B.BURFIELD;K.COLE; P.COPPARD;A.CORNELL;M.COTTINGHAM; A.DRAKE;D.GEORGE;S.HEASMAN;E.OASTLER; B.PLATT;D.PLUMMER;A.POTTER;D.READ; K.SAUNDERS;M.SMITH;Z.STENNING; G.THOMAS;M.WASHER;S.WATKINS and class teacher Mr.YEOMANS.
